forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High around 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 17C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 61F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 11C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
